GameData.Language_en_US:
Welcome to Belobog, outsider. I am Supreme Guardian Bronya Rand. Are you perhaps a member of the Trailblazing expedition that was sent to this planet a long time ago? [NEWLINE]...No? Quite unfortunate...
Greetings to you, outsider. You stand before the Supreme Guardian Bronya Rand, protector of Belobog. How do you do?
Hmmmm... It seems some of our ancestors did manage to survive the Eternal Freeze after all... I welcome you, our most likely distant relatives, to Belobog, the city of Preservation.
No... People of Belobog, i failed you...
Back so soon, outsider?
I thought i already dismissed you... Leave.
Say what you want already!
Already told you... not happening.
Welcome back... Shall we take a midnight stroll and discuss the purpose of your visit over some tea?
Welcome back, outsider. State your business.
Get on with it, outsider. I have other more pressing matters to attend to!
Have you finally come to discuss peace terms, you warmonger?!
Lay down your arms, and we shall be even be merciful to our enemies.
This pointless war has been going on for far too long. What say we stop fighting?
You dare show your face in Qlipoth during war?!
You dare lie to a Supreme Guardian?! This insult shan't be forgotten!
Welcome back, my splendid ally! How goes your day?
Welcome back to my court, outsider. Have you come to plan a joint offensive against our common enemy?
Warmonger...
Welcome back, outsider. How goes the war?
We see your armies near the gates of Belobog, and we are fully prepared for a counter-offensive. I warn you, outsider, step away from the gates!
Outsider! Belobog requests the immediate withdrawal of your armies from our borders!
You are expanding on the territories of our ancestors! We demand you immediately stop plopping down cities wherever you please!
Belobog asks you to cease settling down on the territories of our ancestors, outsider.
Your recent hobby of eating all the land you see will invoke our fury...
Belobog asks of you to stop buying up plots of land that we plan to expand onto.
That's an impressive military you've got there. Almost as strong as Belobog's!
Your people prosper under your rule. That's a sign of a strong, decisive leader.
We've come back after a milennia-long coma, and you've still settled less cities than us? Pathetic.
If I were you, i wouldn't be relying so much on diplomacy. Who knows, someday someone might invade your pathetic little country, and who will protect it? The civilians?
Warmonger...
The nation of Belobog proposes a pact of friendship between our two countries. Together we shall prosper like no one else!
An alliance between our two nations would benefit the both of us. What do you say, friend?
I am glad to have found such a worthy ally in these turbulent times!
Sorry, but I must refuse. We just don't know much about you yet...
{1_CivName} has clearly violated all treaties and international law! We hereby propose that you stand by our side and denounce them!
{1_CivName} has tested our patience time and time again. We shall strike at them to deliver justice, and ask of you to do the same! (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY)
You have revealed your true, twisted nature. Now i shall reveal it to the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You may consider our friendship and mutual assistance over. You're a really horrible person, and the world must know.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The world must know of your evil deeds...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You dare to slander the name of Belobog?!
{1_CivName} has proven to be our worthy ally. I'm glad you consider them your friends.
You allied {1_CivName}? How very unfortunate...
What slander! How dare you mock {1_CivName}?!
We have a common foe. {1_CivName} won't stand a chance against us!
We have decided to ally {1_CivName}. Perhaps we could be allies too?
We have shown the world {1_CivName}'s evil nature. I'm glad we have common ground.
You allied {1_CivName}?! Haven't you heard of their misdeeds?!
The alliance between Belobog and {1_CivName} shall prosper and bring you down someday!
You might have a big army, but remember, quality beats quantity...
Your armament efforts have not gone unnoticed...
Hmph... Alright, prepare to face the tenacious people who have survived a millennia-long fight with the Fragmentum!
You better move...
Our great struggle continues...
Let's hope for both our sakes that wasn't a lie...
We started off asking, now we're demanding. Stop settling onto our ancestors lands!
Back off of our claimed lands. I'm warning you.
It would seem there exists no sense of honor in your nation...
Thank the Aeons we settled this diplomatically.
We started off asking, now we're demanding. Stop stealing our ancestors lands!
Back off of our claimed lands. I'm warning you.
It would seem there exists no sense of honor in your nation...
Good.
-->
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has proven to be quite a nuisance. What say we teach them a lesson? -->
Defeating {1_PlayerName:textkey} would prove beneficial for the both of us, don't you agree? -->
Striking at {1_PlayerName:textkey} now could be the only time he's weak enough! Do you want to help us? -->
-->
The 10 turns are up, it's about time we march on {1_PlayerName:textkey}'s capital. -->
Divine retribution awaits {1_PlayerName:textkey}! Strike deep into his heartlands! -->
{1_PlayerName:textkey}'s time on this planet is up. Let us destroy them together! -->
You are truly the wretch of this world!
You have made yourself an enemy of Belobog. Brace yourself!
Belobog's opinion of you is high. We hope you share the same sentiment.
Defense is Belobog's specialty. I beg of you not to escalate.
How many people did you kill? Have you no empathy?
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} is a part of our sphere of influence. I suggest you find another city state to please!
I'm glad we got that settled.
Very good.
Unfortunate...
You will regret this decision someday!
On behalf of the nation of Belobog, I thank you for rescuing our civilians.
For now we must back down, but you'll regret making an enemy of Belobog...
You must be joking...
I'll remember that!
I already said no! Stop asking!
A reasonable request. We shall stop sending settlers your way.
You dare to demand us not explore our ancestors' lands?! The answer is no!
I shall send our most formidable Silvermane Guards to assist you in the destruction of the enemy!
We understand the situation. Give us 10 turns to prepare and we shall strike fear into the heart of the enemy!
What a twisted personality you have...
Even Belobog has an army bigger than you!
Belobog has developed nuclear weapons of mass destruction, be careful you don't invoke our ire!
Pick on someone your own size, you mongrel!
Your people are miserable! They would be much happier under the protection of Belobog...
Even Belobog has more cities under it's name than you!
Even Belobog has more population than your so-called "Empire!"
There's no use talking to such an uncultured barbarian!
You offer me no other choice. I must accept.
You think you can intimidate the people of Belobog? You're dead wrong!
You dare to make a demand of Belobog?! Guards! Remove this "diplomat" from my office!
Such a greedy demand, you must be kidding!
Again?! It's not happening!
...
Go ahead, make your offer.
There's no need for the war to continue. Let us sign a historic peace.
Belobog demands a tribute from your nation!
Perhaps you could spare something for the people of Belobog?
Our people desire resources your great nation possesses. How about a deal?
There's no need for hostility at our borders, friend! Let's open them for the sake of both our citizens!
Belobog is formally asking you for the opening of your borders.
Technological advancements would be much more quicker if we worked together! What do you say, partner?
Technological advancements would be much more quicker if we worked together! What do you say, partner?
The deal that strengthened the bond of our two nations has ended. What say we extend it's duration?
The deal is clearly no longer fair to both sides. We must at least ask for a bit more!
Exchanging embassies is the first step to diplomacy.
We seek to have emabssies on both sides. What do you say to this?
Incredible. Thank you for your donation to the nation of Belobog!
I think that's a fair trade. We have a deal!
Smart.
This deal is not favorable to us.
Hey! If you came here to make jokes, you can leave!
This is acceptable.
I think this would be more fair...
Sorry, but Belobog can't spare anything at the moment.
I'm sorry, we do not possess anything of equal value...
Sorry, we simply just don't have enough to match your offer.
You've come to test the tenacity of the people of Belobog? We shall stand our ground just like our ancestors did!
This'll be a tough fight for us, I'll admit. But still, we don't plan on giving in, prepare yourself for ferocious resistance!
Are you insane?! Fine, we'll show you just what we can do, since you think you can underestimate us!
You challenge us?! Prepare yourself for a tough fight!
Darn... Fine! I'll meet you on the battlefield!
You dare oppose the might of Belobog?! We shall strike you down! -->
And there I was hoping we could be friendly... How very naive of me...
You ended our trade? Have you no honor?!
How very naive of me to rely on your words. I still have much to learn...
All the circumstances in consideration, Belobog has decided to declare war on your nation. Let us meet honorably on the battlefield!
The lands of ancestors shall be returned to us! See you on the battlefield!
Belobog is unstoppable. Let's see if you'll stand the test of time!
I am sorry to do this to you, but in this world it's kill or be killed. We declare war! -->
I am sorry to do this to you, but in this world it's kill or be killed. We declare war!
Deceit is usually not our style, but with you we had to deploy special maneuvers! You should be honored!
Deceit is usually not our style, but with you we had to deploy special maneuvers! You should be honored!
Refusing our demands was the final straw. Brace yourself for a scrap with the Silvermane Guards!
What would you offer for a peace treaty?
Perfect.
Peace is still off the table, evildoer!
Instead of begging for peace, maybe you should consider raising an army to defend your lands!
Leave {@1_MinorCivName} alone. Try picking on someone your own size!
The destruction of {@1_MinorCivName}, our protectorate, has not gone unnoticed! We shall remember your cowardice!
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} shall soon be ruled over by us. Get over it.
-->
The attack on {1_MinorCivName:textkey} was purely out of self-defense. We hope you understand.
Leave {@1_MinorCivName} alone. Try picking on someone your own size!
You can't protect {@1_MinorCivName}, and you know it! Their tribute shall be better off in our treasury!
-->
We forced {@1_MinorCivName} to give us tribute. We hope you understand.
Good luck, evildoer...
I am glad you understand our situation.
Good luck, evildoer...
-->
Their tribute belongs only to us. We are glad you understand our situation.
So now you've resorted to spying?! Truly barbarious behavior.
We have found out your spy and successfully eliminated him, what do you have to say for yourself?!
You found us out, what can i do except apologize...
We apologize for our diplomat's devious behavior.
That was rather civil. Thank you for resolving this diplomatically.
I was hoping it wouldn't come to this...
No need to be so rude... I won't spy on you anymore.
I must decline your request.
Be warned. {@1_CivAdjective} doesn't have a clue about what diplomacy is. -->
I felt as if i had to tell you, {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. -->
-->
{1_PlayerName} will attack {2_CityName} soon. You owe me for this...
{1_PlayerName} is plotting a sneak attack against you, brace yourself.
{1_PlayerName} has assembled a naval invasion against {2_CityName}. Blow them out of the water.
{1_PlayerName} has assembled a massive fleet to wrestle control of your seas! Get ready for a fight!
The wound will heal with time...
Thank you for being so understandable.
The people of Belobog have only one god! The Aeon of Preservation! Send your missionaries home this instant!
Good. Who knows what I would've done if you had no common sense...
You WILL pay for this.
Alright, we'll deter our missionaries from your civilization.
The words of the Aeon of Preservation shall not be censored!
I summoned you to Qlipoth Fort to discuss your little adventures in our lands. We demand you stop digging up our ancestors artifacts!
I'm glad we resolved this peacefully.
How rude!
A reasonable request. We'll refrain from your artifacts from now on.
Those artifacts belong to our people. I must decline.
I'm glad we follow the same ideology of Freedom.
We shall retain order in both of our great civilizations!
In order to effectively rule, we must resort to full autocracy. I see you understand this aswell.
Stop spreading your ideological tendencies, the people are turning rebellious!
Stop spreading your ideological tendencies, the people are turning rebellious!
Stop spreading your ideological tendencies, the people are turning rebellious!
Ah, you're finally starting to follow the correct ideology. I'm happy for you.
Ah, you're finally starting to follow the correct ideology. I'm happy for you.
Ah, you're finally starting to follow the correct ideology. I'm happy for you.
Welcome to the right side of history.
Welcome to the right side of history.
Welcome to the right side of history.
A truly splendid proposal at {1_LeagueName}. I'm glad our goals are aligned.
So you're actively spreading negative proposals at {1_LeagueName} just to ruin us? Great, another enemy.
Thanks for voting for our proposal at {1_LeagueName}.
You voted against us at {1_LeagueName}? The people of Belobog never forget.
I thank you for voting for me to host {1_LeagueName}. I shall lead us into a new world!
You have completely eclipsed our culture, and our people think they descend from your civilization. How truly embarassing...
We humbly welcome your people to our civilization.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations with them.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
